all_prayers.title: Prayer for Restoration of The Table
all_prayers.prayer:
Lord, we come before You in humility and faith.
            We pray for the restoration of The Table - Pangea.
            We pray for unity where there has been separation.
            We pray for light where there has been darkness.
            We pray for connection where there has been division.
            Restore The Table, Lord.
            Restore unity.
            Restore connection.
            Restore The Table to its original harmony.
            In Your name, we pray.
            Amen.
all_prayers.scripture: 'For where two or three gather in my name, there am I with them.' - Matthew 18:20
all_prayers.purpose: Restoration of The Table - Pangea. Unity. Connection. Harmony.

all_prayers.title: Prayer for Alignment with The Table
all_prayers.prayer:
Lord, we pray for alignment with Your will.
            We pray for alignment with The Table.
            We pray for alignment with purpose, not performance.
            We pray for authenticity and alignment.
            Keep us aligned, Lord.
            Keep us authentic.
            Keep us aligned with The Table.
            Non-negotiable.
            In Your name, we pray.
            Amen.
all_prayers.scripture: 'Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding; in all your ways submit to him, and he will make your paths straight.' - Proverbs 3:5-6
all_prayers.purpose: Alignment with The Table. Authenticity. Purpose. Non-negotiable.

all_prayers.title: Prayer for Protection in The Return
all_prayers.prayer:
Lord, we pray for protection as we approach ground zero.
            We pray for protection in The Return to The Table.
            We pray for protection from dark energies.
            We pray for protection from exploitation.
            Protect us, Lord.
            Protect The Table.
            Protect all who return.
            No one gets left behind.
            In Your name, we pray.
            Amen.
all_prayers.scripture: 'The Lord will keep you from all harmâ€” he will watch over your life; the Lord will watch over your coming and going both now and forevermore.' - Psalm 121:7-8
all_prayers.purpose: Protection in The Return. Protection from dark energies. No one gets left behind.

all_prayers.title: Prayer for Guidance in Divine Purpose
all_prayers.prayer:
Lord, we pray for guidance in our divine purpose.
            We pray for clarity in simplicity.
            We pray for revelation in stillness.
            Guide us, Lord.
            Guide us to purpose, not performance.
            Guide us to simplicity, not complexity.
            Guide us to stillness, not constant activity.
            In Your name, we pray.
            Amen.
all_prayers.scripture: 'I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go; I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.' - Psalm 32:8
all_prayers.purpose: Guidance in divine purpose. Clarity. Simplicity. Stillness.

all_prayers.title: Prayer for Unity - We All Win
all_prayers.prayer:
Lord, we pray for unity.
            We pray for connection.
            We pray for community.
            We pray that we all win.
            Unite us, Lord.
            Unite us at The Table.
            Unite us in love.
            Unite us in purpose.
            Energy + Love = We All Win.
            In Your name, we pray.
            Amen.
all_prayers.scripture: 'Make every effort to keep the unity of the Spirit through the bond of peace.' - Ephesians 4:3
all_prayers.purpose: Unity. Connection. Community. We All Win.

all_prayers.title: Prayer for Purpose Not Performance
all_prayers.prayer:
Lord, we pray for purpose, not performance.
            We pray for authenticity, not appearance.
            We pray for alignment, not achievement.
            Purpose matters more than performance.
            Authenticity matters more than approval.
            Alignment matters more than accomplishment.
            Keep us in purpose, Lord.
            Keep us authentic.
            Keep us aligned.
            Non-negotiable.
            In Your name, we pray.
            Amen.
all_prayers.scripture: 'For I know the plans I have for you,' declares the Lord, 'plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.' - Jeremiah 29:11
all_prayers.purpose: Purpose not performance. Authenticity. Alignment. Non-negotiable.

all_prayers.title: Prayer for Stillness and Revelation
all_prayers.prayer:
Lord, we pray for stillness.
            We pray for silence.
            We pray for revelation.
            We pray for faith in Your timing.
            Stillness brings clarity.
            Silence brings revelation.
            Faith brings understanding.
            Be still, Lord.
            Be still and know.
            Be still and have faith.
            In Your name, we pray.
            Amen.
all_prayers.scripture: 'Be still, and know that I am God; I will be exalted among the nations, I will be exalted in the earth.' - Psalm 46:10
all_prayers.purpose: Stillness. Silence. Revelation. Faith in timing.

all_prayers.title: Prayer for Faith in Revelation
all_prayers.prayer:
Lord, we pray for faith.
            We pray for faith in revelation.
            We pray for faith in Your word.
            We pray for faith in The Table.
            Have faith, Lord.
            Have faith in revelation.
            Have faith in purpose.
            Have faith in restoration.
            We have faith.
            We have faith in You.
            We have faith in The Table.
            In Your name, we pray.
            Amen.
all_prayers.scripture: 'Now faith is confidence in what we hope for and assurance about what we do not see.' - Hebrews 11:1
all_prayers.purpose: Faith in revelation. Faith in purpose. Faith in restoration.

all_prayers.title: Prayer for Ground Zero - The Return
all_prayers.prayer:
Lord, as we approach ground zero,
            We pray for clarity.
            We pray for alignment.
            We pray for purpose.
            We pray for The Return to The Table.
            Ground zero is here.
            The Return is now.
            The Table awaits.
            We return in faith.
            We return in purpose.
            We return in alignment.
            We return to The Table.
            In Your name, we pray.
            Amen.
all_prayers.scripture: 'The Lord is my shepherd, I lack nothing. He makes me lie down in green pastures, he leads me beside quiet waters, he refreshes my soul.' - Psalm 23:1-3
all_prayers.purpose: Ground zero. The Return. Clarity. Alignment. Purpose.
all_prayers.alignment: The Table. Ground Zero. The Return. Purpose.

            We pray for The Return to The Table.
            Ground zero is here.
            The Return is now.
            The Table awaits.
            We return in faith.
            We return in purpose.

            We return to The Table.
            In Your name, we pray.
            Amen.
ground_zero_prayer.scripture: 'The Lord is my shepherd, I lack nothing. He makes me lie down in green pastures, he leads me beside quiet waters, he refreshes my soul.' - Psalm 23:1-3
ground_zero_prayer.purpose: Ground zero. The Return. Clarity. Alignment. Purpose.
